author: fabiocos
body:
#### PR description:

Since BTL and ETL are using quite different sensor technologies and materials (LYSO crystals vs 50 micron thick LGAD silicon sensors) it makes sense to separate production cuts for the sensitive volumes. The values for ETL are lowered by a factor of 10, following what si done for tracker pixel in Phase II, but this may be further tuned afterwards.

At the same time obsolete fasttime files are removed from the HGCal areas (@bsunanda FYI, please comment in case).

#### PR validation:

Test wf 23234 and 24434 run, the LogVerbatim output of ```DDG4ProductionCuts``` shows the desired splitting:

```
  num  1 regionName: FastTimerRegion, the store of size 16
DDG4ProductionCuts : regionName FastTimerRegion, the store of size 16
DDG4ProductionCuts : region FastTimerRegion
DDG4ProductionCuts : new G4Region EndcapTimingLayer
DDG4ProductionCuts : Setting cuts for FastTimerRegion
    Electrons: 0.1
    Positrons: 0.1
    Gamma    : 0.1
    Proton   : 0.1
  added EndcapTimingLayer to region FastTimerRegion
  num  1 regionName: FastTimerRegionSensETL, the store of size 17
DDG4ProductionCuts : regionName FastTimerRegionSensETL, the store of size 17
DDG4ProductionCuts : region FastTimerRegionSensETL
DDG4ProductionCuts : new G4Region EModule_Timingactive
DDG4ProductionCuts : Setting cuts for FastTimerRegionSensETL
    Electrons: 0.01
    Positrons: 0.01
    Gamma    : 0.01
    Proton   : 0.01
  added EModule_Timingactive to region FastTimerRegionSensETL
```

title: MTD geometry: separate BTL and ETL sensitive volume prod cuts
